mcq.statement: What was the main purpose of the Lucknow Pact of 1916?

options.b: To get more favours from British government after World War 1

mcq.one_liner: The main purpose of the Lucknow Pact of 1916 was to secure more favours from the **British government** at the end of World War 1.
